Got it. We'll send a replacement right away.
Do I need to return the incorrect item?
No need to return it. You can keep it or donate it.
Wow, that’s generous. Thanks!
You're welcome. Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, that would be all. Thanks again.
Have a great day!

I’m sorry to hear that. Can you share your tracking number?
Thanks. Let me check the status for you.
It says the package was delivered yesterday.
I didn’t receive anything.
Can you check with neighbors or building management?
Yes, I’ll ask them and call back if needed.
Sounds good. We’ll help you if it’s still missing.
Hi, I want to cancel my order.
Let me assist you with that. Can I have the order number?
Order number is 789654123.
It’s already shipped. We can process a return once delivered.
Okay, I’ll wait and return it then.
You’ll get a return label via email. Use that to send it back.
Thanks for your help.
You're welcome!

I’m really sorry about that. Can you share a photo of the issue?
Yes, I’ll email it right away.
Perfect. We’ll review and issue a refund or replacement.
I didn’t receive an order confirmation email.
Can you check your spam folder? Sometimes emails land there.
Yes, it was in spam. Thanks!
Happy to help!

Absolutely. The refund will be processed within 3–5 days.

Always here to help!
